extendedInfo.description: Application is a compilation of the individual keyboard shortcuts available in Microsoft PowerPoint.          If you don't remember Microsoft PowerPoint Commands/Shortcuts, you can use this App.Note Shortcut keys mentioned in the Help topics, menus, and dialog boxes refer to the U.S. keyboard layout. Keys on other layouts may not correspond exactly to the keys on a U.S. keyboard. If you are using a different language keyboard layout from the version of PowerPoint you are using, you may have to make adjustments when using shortcut keys.
